<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="ApiKey">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/apiKey.ts#L27" >}}">class <b>ApiKey</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides an AppSync API Key.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const exampleGraphQLApi = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "API_KEY",
});
const exampleApiKey = new aws.appsync.ApiKey("example", {
    apiId: exampleGraphQLApi.id,
    expires: "2018-05-03T04:00:00Z",
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/appsync_api_key.html.markdown.

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="DataSource">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/dataSource.ts#L73" >}}">class <b>DataSource</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides an AppSync DataSource.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const exampleGraphQLApi = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "API_KEY",
});
const exampleTable = new aws.dynamodb.Table("example", {
    attributes: [{
        name: "UserId",
        type: "S",
    }],
    hashKey: "UserId",
    readCapacity: 1,
    writeCapacity: 1,
});
const exampleRole = new aws.iam.Role("example", {
    assumeRolePolicy: `{
  "Version": "2012-10-17",
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Action": "sts:AssumeRole",
      "Principal": {
        "Service": "appsync.amazonaws.com"
      },
      "Effect": "Allow"
    }
  ]
}
`,
});
const exampleDataSource = new aws.appsync.DataSource("example", {
    apiId: exampleGraphQLApi.id,
    dynamodbConfig: {
        tableName: exampleTable.name,
    },
    serviceRoleArn: exampleRole.arn,
    type: "AMAZON_DYNAMODB",
});
const exampleRolePolicy = new aws.iam.RolePolicy("example", {
    policy: pulumi.interpolate`{
  "Version": "2012-10-17",
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Action": [
        "dynamodb:*"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": [
        "${exampleTable.arn}"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
`,
    role: exampleRole.id,
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/appsync_datasource.html.markdown.

{{% /md %}}

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="Function">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/function.ts#L67" >}}">class <b>Function</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides an AppSync Function.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const testGraphQLApi = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("test", {
    authenticationType: "API_KEY",
    schema: `type Mutation {
    putPost(id: ID!, title: String!): Post
}

type Post {
    id: ID!
    title: String!
}

type Query {
    singlePost(id: ID!): Post
}

schema {
    query: Query
    mutation: Mutation
}
`,
});
const testDataSource = new aws.appsync.DataSource("test", {
    apiId: testGraphQLApi.id,
    httpConfig: {
        endpoint: "http://example.com",
    },
    type: "HTTP",
});
const testFunction = new aws.appsync.Function("test", {
    apiId: testGraphQLApi.id,
    dataSource: testDataSource.name,
    requestMappingTemplate: `{
    "version": "2018-05-29",
    "method": "GET",
    "resourcePath": "/",
    "params":{
        "headers": $utils.http.copyheaders($ctx.request.headers)
    }
}
`,
    responseMappingTemplate: `#if($ctx.result.statusCode == 200)
    $ctx.result.body
#else
    $utils.appendError($ctx.result.body, $ctx.result.statusCode)
#end
`,
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/appsync_function.html.markdown.

{{% /md %}}

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="GraphQLApi">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/graphQLApi.ts#L116" >}}">class <b>GraphQLApi</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides an AppSync GraphQL API.

## Example Usage

### API Key Authentication

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "API_KEY",
});
```

### AWS Cognito User Pool Authentication

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "AMAZON_COGNITO_USER_POOLS",
    userPoolConfig: {
        awsRegion: aws_region_current.name,
        defaultAction: "DENY",
        userPoolId: aws_cognito_user_pool_example.id,
    },
});
```

### AWS IAM Authentication

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "AWS_IAM",
});
```

### With Schema
```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "AWS_IAM",
    schema: `schema {
	query: Query
}
type Query {
  test: Int
}
`,
});
```

### OpenID Connect Authentication

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    authenticationType: "OPENID_CONNECT",
    openidConnectConfig: {
        issuer: "https://example.com",
    },
});
```

### Enabling Logging

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const exampleRole = new aws.iam.Role("example", {
    assumeRolePolicy: `{
    "Version": "2012-10-17",
    "Statement": [
        {
        "Effect": "Allow",
        "Principal": {
            "Service": "appsync.amazonaws.com"
        },
        "Action": "sts:AssumeRole"
        }
    ]
}
`,
});
const exampleGraphQLApi = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("example", {
    logConfig: {
        cloudwatchLogsRoleArn: exampleRole.arn,
        fieldLogLevel: "ERROR",
    },
});
const exampleRolePolicyAttachment = new aws.iam.RolePolicyAttachment("example", {
    policyArn: "arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSAppSyncPushToCloudWatchLogs",
    role: exampleRole.name,
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/appsync_graphql_api.html.markdown.

{{% /md %}}

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GraphQLApi-logConfig">

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="Resolver">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/resolver.ts#L86" >}}">class <b>Resolver</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>
{{% md %}}

Provides an AppSync Resolver.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const testGraphQLApi = new aws.appsync.GraphQLApi("test", {
    authenticationType: "API_KEY",
    schema: `type Mutation {
	putPost(id: ID!, title: String!): Post
}

type Post {
	id: ID!
	title: String!
}

type Query {
	singlePost(id: ID!): Post
}

schema {
	query: Query
	mutation: Mutation
}
`,
});
const testDataSource = new aws.appsync.DataSource("test", {
    apiId: testGraphQLApi.id,
    httpConfig: {
        endpoint: "http://example.com",
    },
    type: "HTTP",
});
// PIPELINE type resolver
const mutationPipelineTest = new aws.appsync.Resolver("Mutation_pipelineTest", {
    apiId: testGraphQLApi.id,
    field: "pipelineTest",
    kind: "PIPELINE",
    pipelineConfig: {
        functions: [
            aws_appsync_function_test1.functionId,
            aws_appsync_function_test2.functionId,
            aws_appsync_function_test3.functionId,
        ],
    },
    requestTemplate: "{}",
    responseTemplate: "$util.toJson($ctx.result)",
    type: "Mutation",
});
// UNIT type resolver (default)
const testResolver = new aws.appsync.Resolver("test", {
    apiId: testGraphQLApi.id,
    dataSource: testDataSource.name,
    field: "singlePost",
    requestTemplate: `{
    "version": "2018-05-29",
    "method": "GET",
    "resourcePath": "/",
    "params":{
        "headers": $utils.http.copyheaders($ctx.request.headers)
    }
}
`,
    responseTemplate: `#if($ctx.result.statusCode == 200)
    $ctx.result.body
#else
    $utils.appendError($ctx.result.body, $ctx.result.statusCode)
#end
`,
    type: "Query",
});
```

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/appsync_resolver.html.markdown.

{{% /md %}}
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="Resolver-constructor">

* `args` The arguments to use to populate this resource&#39;s properties.

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ApiKeyArgs-expires">

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="ApiKeyState">

</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
{{% md %}}

Input properties used for looking up and filtering ApiKey resources.

{{% /md %}}
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ApiKeyState-apiId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/apiKey.ts#L115" >}}">property <b>apiId</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>apiId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The ID of the associated AppSync API

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ApiKeyState-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/apiKey.ts#L119" >}}">property <b>description</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The API key description. Defaults to "Managed by Pulumi".

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ApiKeyState-expires">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="{{< pkg-url pkg="aws" path="appsync/apiKey.ts#L123" >}}">property <b>expires</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>expires?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

RFC3339 string representation of the expiry date. Rounded down to nearest hour. By default, it is 7 days from the date of creation.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
